text:
hey there! _(I am new here, so in case this message in in the wrong channel let me know.)_

So, I am just wondering *IF something like a unified CRM API solution might be interesting for someone of you to try/test. (use case, you run a business, and this business operates a few different CRMs under one umbrella = so our solution could integrate with those CRMs/etc)* The API we built has the ability to connect to 30+ CRM systems (including HubSpot of course)

Really looking to get some feedback.
Thanks
Hi All, How we can do the integration Zalo with HubSpot ? Any suggestions will be appreciated

Hello, please bare with me. First time using this HubSpot Slack channel. I have been using <https://community.HubSpot.com/|HubSpot Community>.

*<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files#upload-a-file|Uploading a document>* (txt, pdf, etc...) using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files|Files endpoint>:

Question: *`field "file": {binary data}`*
What is the expected encoding?

POST request returning
```{"status":"error","message":"Could not determine name from file",...,"category":"BAD_REQUEST"}```

```curl --location '<https://api.HubSpot.com/files/v3/files>' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer [** Private App Token **]' \
--form 'file="[** Base64 **]"' \
--form 'folderPath="[** HubSpot File Manager Folder Name **]"' \
--form 'options="{\"access\":\"PRIVATE\",\"ttl\":\"P2W\",\"overwrite\":false,\"duplicateValidationStrategy\":\"NONE\",\"duplicateValidationScope\":\"EXACT_FOLDER\"}"' \
--form 'fileName="HubSpot_test.txt"'```

<@UQNEXHW14> Are you aware of any *HubSpot API developer support, whether paid or subscription*?

<https://www.npmjs.com/package/@HubSpot/api-client|npm @HubSpot/api-client> is not maintained, bug issues have been unaddressed for many months

Is it possible to update a specific deal’s property without using the
/crm/v3/objects/deals/{dealId} url and instead using the deal ID in the JSON payload?

I’m building a webhook from Zendesk to update a property and I can’t dynamically add the id to the webhook endpoint URL
You can use the batch endpoint to get this done
HI team, I need help with custom modules in HubSpot. Is there a easy way to get content of custom modules over the API ?

For some sections i dont receive any content
{
                                “0”: {
                                    “cells”: [],
                                    “cssClass”: “”,
                                    “cssId”: “”,
                                    “cssStyle”: “”,
                                    “label”: “DND - Richtext”,
                                    “name”: “widget_168570XXXX945",
                                    “params”: {
                                        “css_class”: “dnd-module”,
                                        “module_id”: XXXX3865555,
                                        “schema_version”: 2
                                    },
                                    “rowMetaData”: [],
                                    “rows”: [],
                                    “type”: “custom_widget”,
                                    “w”: 12,
                                    “x”: 0
                                }
